subject: Religion & Spirituality
title: Pentecostalism: Christianity's Fastest Growth
description: A micro-lesson that makes Pentecostalism: Christianity's Fastest Growth usable.

hook.text: Speaking in tongues, faith healing, ecstatic worship. Pentecostalism started in 1906 and now has 600 million followers.

buildup.text: It began at the Azusa Street Revival in Los Angeles. A Black preacher led an interracial revival that shocked the city.

discovery.text: Pentecostalism emphasizes direct experience of the Holy Spirit. Worship is emotional, physical, and spontaneous.

twist.text: It's growing fastest among the poor in Africa, Asia, and Latin America. It offers hope, healing, and belonging.

climax.text: Pentecostalism may be the future of Christianity. Emotional faith is outpacing intellectual theology worldwide.

punchline.text: 600 million in a century. Pentecostalism is Christianity's rocket engine.

quiz.question: Where did Pentecostalism begin?
options: At the Azusa Street Revival in Los Angeles
